title: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard for creating nested classes, the context is not set correctly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue with the new class wizard not setting the context correctly for nested classes, follow these steps:
1. Open the new class wizard.
2. Choose the option to create a nested class.
3. Specify the parent class for the nested class.
4. Complete the wizard and create the nested class.
5. Verify that the context of the nested class is not set correctly.
